fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: * Clean someone's house during the night, if they die then the kill isnt announced until the end of the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
* If your target dies the killer will know who you are
* Players you cleaned that die during the time they were cleaned will show the original killer instead of whatever killed them, this includes lynching
* Neutral killers will know that you are in the setup

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose
